alert.note: Alert for Orange (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 05 at 3:23PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Orange County through 400 PM EDT... At 322 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Oakland, or 7 miles north of Port Jervis, drifting northwest. HAZARD...Pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Cuddebackville and Deerpark. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
